name: The Grass of Genesis
summary: This third-person action-adventure seems to be akin to the beloved Tomb Raider series and the adrenaline-packed John Wick film franchise. The gameplay video showcases a prototype that introduces various gameplay elements and engaging animated cinematic sequences.
